CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- $Id$
Filter which sets the status of the Protocol.
$Log: not supported by cvs2svn $ Revision 1.1 2002/02/07 13:10:22 bkline Initial revision
-->
<xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr" version = "1.0">
<xsl:param name = "newStatus"/>
<!-- Identity rule, copies everything to the output tree. --> <xsl:template match = "@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select = "@*|node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- This is the only specific template in the script. --> <xsl:template match = "ProtocolAdminInfo/CurrentProtocolStatus"> <CurrentProtocolStatus> <xsl:value-of select = "$newStatus"/> </CurrentProtocolStatus> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
